title: Dreadknight Garen skin code not working
body:
Hello, 

I followed the official LoL twitter account and got the code, but I was unable to redeem it. It certainly wasn't an old code and I didn't try to get it before or something like that. Any idea why this is happening and where is the problem?

Thank you

replies.body: Those codes just don't seem to work correctly every once and awhile, no worries fam. I went ahead and got that added for you, so be sure to refresh your client if you don't see it at first.

i got the code from the woobox i like the twiter page with my twiter account but the code is not working for me would you please add the dreadknight skin to my account i face the error with should i in orginal reagion and i dont know why thank you so much
i cant get the dreadknight garen skin it says error :( but alistar and tristana worked fine :) please help me get dreadknight garen skin
i am having the same problem, my summoner name is Leoremz
Thank you for the help, it's all right now :)
You could either submit a ticket and request the skin from there, or wait for one of the poros to notice you here and add it to your account.
